footer: RoadSoft Import Application — Client IT Specification — v2.1.8
subtitle: IT Specification — Version 2.1.8
purpose: Automated synchronization of digital tachograph files (`.ddd`, `.esm`) to the RoadSoft cloud platform
privileges_value: No administrator or root privileges required
important_peruser: RoadSoft installs per user, not per computer. Each user who requires the application must install it under their own operating system user profile.
note_hidden: The `AppData` folder is hidden by default in Windows. Enable "Show hidden files" in File Explorer to access it.
file_processing_intro: After synchronization, processed items are automatically relocated based on the sync result. Top-level `.ddd`/`.esm` files are moved individually; when a file resides inside a subfolder, the entire top-level folder is moved to preserve its directory structure. Corrupted `.zip` archives are moved to `Failed/` during the initial scan.
archived_contents: Files that were uploaded to the RoadSoft platform successfully
failed_contents: Files that could not be uploaded (e.g. corrupted archives, network errors)
note_file_processing: Both folders are created automatically inside the selected sync folder. They are excluded from future scans, so files placed there will not be re-processed.
note_zip_trash: After a `.zip` archive is successfully extracted, the original `.zip` file is automatically moved to the OS recycle bin and can be restored from there if needed.
autolaunch: Auto-launch on system startup is supported and configurable within the application
